title: Fetish Film Screening Party
description: An evening of fetish-themed films at The House (Bushwick).

title: Mix NYC Queer Experimental Film Festival
description: A festival showcasing queer experimental films at Quad Cinema (Greenwich Village).

title: Insomnia Film Series
description: Film series featuring classics like Taxi Driver, Hour of the Wolf, The Machinist, and Fight Club at Metrograph (LES).

title: My Crazy Uncle (or Aunt) Film Series
description: Film series featuring Uncle Buck, Auntie Mame, Napoleon Dynamite, Practical Magic, and more at Metrograph (LES).

title: Nicholas Uncaged Film Series
description: Film series featuring Wild at Heart, Adaptation, National Treasure, and more at Metrograph (LES).

title: Heartbreak is the National Anthem: How Taylor Swift Reinvented Pop Music
description: Rob Sheffield discusses his new book on Taylor Swift at Barnes & Noble 82nd + Broadway (UWS).

title: 31st Annual Harlem Holiday Lights
description: Annual holiday lights parade featuring 20 lighted floats and vehicles along 125th Street. Grand Marshal: Misty Copeland.

title: Collage Poetry Workshop
description: Create heartfelt poems at this workshop with all materials provided at Otto’s Shrunken Head Bar (East Village).
address: Otto’s Shrunken Head Bar, East Village

title: 2024 National Book Awards Finalists Reading
description: Readings by the 2024 National Book Award finalists at NYU Skirball (Greenwich Village).

title: Letters + Sodas: LIC Reading Series
description: Local comedians and writers read from their original works at The Greats of Craft (Long Island City).
address: The Greats of Craft, Long Island City

title: Brooklyn Books + Booze
description: Monthly reading series featuring established and up-and-coming authors at Barrow's Intense Tasting Room (Industry City).
address: Barrow's Intense Tasting Room, Industry City

title: Astronomy on Tap: X-Ray Astronomy
description: An evening of astronomy talks and themed games at Pete’s Candy Store (Williamsburg).

title: The Broad Squad
description: Monthly variety show featuring stand-up, storytelling, music, and tarot readings at Young Ethel’s (Park Slope).

title: Animation Nights New York
description: Monthly screening of animated short films and VR experiences at The Gutter Spare Room (Williamsburg).

title: Sweet Comedy Show: Sweets-Giving
description: Live comedy show featuring guests at Chelsea Music Hall.
